:root{--terminal-bg:#202020}*{box-sizing:border-box}body{background:#1e1e1e;color:#3c3c3c;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative}a{color:#39d3fa;text-decoration:none}#desktop{align-items:center;background:#1e1e1e;background:url(8f2416309697403db4658eb16bfdc4a7.jpeg) 50% 50%/cover no-repeat;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:space-between;height:100vh;overflow:hidden;position:relative;touch-action:none;user-select:none}.last-clicked{z-index:1000}.panel{position:absolute;border-radius:.5rem;box-shadow:.1rem .2rem 2.1rem rgba(0,0,0,.4);display:flex;flex-direction:column}.panel-header{background:#f8f8f8;background:linear-gradient(#f5f5f5,#c5c5c5);border-top-left-radius:.5rem;border-top-right-radius:.5rem;display:flex;flex:0 0 auto;padding:.4rem}.panel.full-screen{top:0!important;bottom:0!important;right:0!important;left:0!important;width:100%!important;height:100%!important}.panel.full-screen,.panel.full-screen .panel-header{border-radius:0!important}#terminal{background:var(--terminal-bg);color:#fff;display:flex;flex-direction:column;font-family:Courier New,Courier;height:20.5rem;width:33rem;touch-action:none;user-select:none;left:5%;top:10%;word-break:break-all;z-index:2}#terminal .command{font-size:1rem;opacity:.6}p.command:before{content:"$";margin-right:.6rem}.result{margin-bottom:1.4rem}#my-contact,#my-name,#terminal #my-description{font-size:1.7rem}#terminal-body{flex:1;padding:1rem}p{margin:0}p.active:after{content:"|";opacity:1;font-weight:100;position:relative;top:-.07rem;left:-.2rem;-webkit-animation:blink .7s infinite;-moz-animation:blink .7s infinite;-ms-animation:blink .7s infinite;-o-animation:blink .7s infinite;animation:blink .7s infinite}@keyframes blink{0%{opacity:1}50%{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}#blank,#cat,#ls,#my-contact,#my-description,#my-name{display:none}#my-name{line-height:.9}.buttons{align-items:center;flex-direction:row;display:flex;margin-right:.5rem;position:relative}.panel-button{border-radius:50%;line-height:0;margin-right:.4rem;height:.75rem;width:.75rem}.panel-button.red{background:#f96256;border:1px solid #f65549}.panel-button:after{color:rgba(0,0,0,.5);font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:.7rem;position:relative;visibility:hidden;top:4.8px;left:1.8px}.panel-button.red:after{content:"\00d7"}.panel-button.yellow:after{content:"\2013";top:4px}.panel-button.green:after{content:"+"}#chrome{background:#fff;display:none;overflow:hidden;top:3%;height:35rem;width:50rem}#chrome .panel-button:after{top:4px;left:2px}#chrome .panel-button.yellow:after{top:3px;left:2.1px}.buttons:hover .panel-button:after{visibility:visible}#url-wrapper{border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.2);flex:0 0 auto;padding:.25rem .5rem;width:100%;height:35px}#url-arrows,#url-wrapper{align-items:center;display:flex}#url-arrows img{margin-right:.7rem;width:1.2rem}#url{align-items:center;background:rgba(0,0,0,.05);border-radius:1rem;display:flex;padding:.2rem 1.5rem;height:100%;width:100%}#back-arrow{transform:rotate(135deg)}#forward-arrow{transform:rotate(-45deg)}#url-arrows #refresh{width:.9rem}.panel-button.yellow{background:#fdbc3d;border:1px solid #ffb524}.panel-button.green{background:#33c948;border:1px solid #2dbb41}.panel-body{display:flex}#chrome .panel-body{flex-direction:column;justify-content:center}#projects{overflow:auto;padding:3rem}.project-card{align-items:center;box-shadow:.1rem .3rem 1rem p{font-size:.9rem;line-height:1.5;text-align:left}.project-details a:hover{color:#91b3bf}#dock{align-items:center;background-color:hsla(0,0%,92.2%,.7);padding:.5rem 0 .5rem .8rem;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.1);border-radius:.5rem .5rem 0 0;box-shadow:0 .5rem 1rem rgba(0,0,0,.25);border-top-left-radius:.5rem;border-top-right-radius:.5rem;display:flex;margin-bottom:0;min-height:5.87rem;min-width:21.087rem;position:fixed;bottom:0;z-index:2000;transition:transform .1s ease-in-out}#dock.collapsed{transform:translateY(100%)}#dock>div{position:relative}.dock-title{border-radius:.3rem;background-color:#d7d7d7;box-shadow:0 .5rem 1rem rgba(0,0,0,.25);padding:.25rem .9rem;position:absolute;top:-3.4rem;visibility:hidden}.dock-title:after{content:"";position:absolute;top:100%;left:50%;margin-left:-.4rem;width:0;height:0;border-top:.4rem solid #d7d7d7;border-left:.4rem solid transparent;border-right:.4rem solid transparent}#dock>div:hover .dock-title{visibility:visible}#dock div:first-of-type .dock-title{right:.2rem}#dock div:nth-of-type(2) .dock-title{top:-3.15rem;right:-.1rem}#dock div:nth-of-type(3) .dock-title{top:-3.3rem;right:-.1rem}#dock div:last-of-type .dock-title{top:-3.15rem}#dock img{max-width:4.5rem}#dock img:hover{cursor:pointer}#dock div:not(#work) img{margin-right:.4rem}#contact{margin-right:.8rem}#work img{margin-right:.5rem;width:4.5rem}#about img{width:4rem}#contact img{width:4.2rem}#trash{border-left:1px solid #868686;padding-left:.4rem}
